description: renowned as The Wandering Miko (歩きの巫女, Aruki no Miko, Viz: The Wandering Nun), was an Anbu from Konohagakure`s Root division. She left the organisation and became a jōnin in the regular forces, a captain of the Medic Corps, and a caretaker at the village`s orphanage. At the orphanage she became known as "Mother" (マザー, Mazā). While undercover in Iwagakure, she went by the name "Nanigashi" (ナニガシ, Nanigashi).
name: Yakushi Nonou
